content: squared ripples copyright katidcreations 2016 materials vanna s choice black ca pink cb white cc i/5 5mm gauge 15 single_crochet x 13 row copyright katidcreations 2016 page 1 stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only st s stitch es space space special stitches invisible join tutorial by look at what i made fl - front loop only tutorial by moogly blog drop double_crochet working in the fl of the indicated row you will work a double_crochet with ca magic_ring r1 work 12 single_crochet in magic_ring join with blo slip_stitch in first single_crochet 12 sts r2 ch1 blo single_crochet in same as joining and next st ch2 *blo single_crochet in next 3 sts ch2 repeat from * around blo single_crochet in next st finish off join with invisible join 12 sts 4 ch2 spaces with cb r3 join in blo in first single_crochet after any ch2 space blo single_crochet in same as joining drop double_crochet in fl of r1 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts copyright katidcreations 2016 page 2 ch2 *blo single_crochet in next 2 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r1 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 repeat from * around blo single_crochet in next st join with blo slip_stitch in first single_crochet 20 sts 4 ch2 spaces copyright katidcreations 2016 page 3 r4 ch1 drop double_crochet in fl of r2 skip next st blo single_crochet in next st drop double_crochet in fl of r2 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 *blo single_crochet in next 2 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r2 skip next st blo single_crochet in next st drop double_crochet in fl of r2 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 repeat from * around blo single_crochet in next 2 sts finish off join with invisible join 28 sts 4 ch2 spaces copyright katidcreations 2016 page 4 with cc r5 join in blo in first single_crochet after any ch2 space blo single_crochet in same as joining drop double_crochet in fl of r3 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 3 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r3 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 *blo single_crochet in next 2 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r3 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 3 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r3 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 repeat from * around blo single_crochet in next st join with blo slip_stitch in first single_crochet 36 sts 4 ch2 spaces r6 ch1 drop double_crochet in fl of r4 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 5 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r4 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 *blo single_crochet in next 2 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r4 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 5 sts drop double_crochet in fl of r4 skip next st blo single_crochet in next 2 sts ch2 repeat from *
